sections.title: What I did?
sections.description: Where I rolled up my sleeves on launches‚Äîfrom the first interview notes to the dashboards teams now check every morning.

items.title: Writeomatic Growth OS
items.summary: I blended online campaigns and UI refreshes so the AI copilot feels like a teammate everywhere it shows up.
outcomes: Interviewed 12 marketers in-person and logged insights in Google Docs, then rebuilt the homepage and onboarding flow in Figma using their exact language.
Spun up a Notion newsroom with Canva templates and Capcut cutdowns so Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube Shorts posts shipped twice a week.
Tracked trial cohorts in Google Sheets and coordinated WhatsApp nudges that lifted trial-to-qualified pipeline by 52%.

items.title: Ahdus Technology AI Practice
items.summary: I turned AI delivery notes into polished marketing moments and UI touchpoints executives could act on.
outcomes: Shadowed solution architects, then mapped the buyer story in Figma wireframes and Adobe CC mockups before publishing inside WordPress.
Built a plain-language glossary and KPI highlights in Canva so executives could grasp the offer in one scroll.
Led fortnightly run-throughs with Google Slides agendas and Miro roadmaps to keep marketing and delivery aligned.

items.title: Sheen Jeem x Shamojee Launch Stack
items.summary: I choreographed launch weeks that felt like a party online and offline for two sensory sister brands.
outcomes: Hosted pop-up tastings and filmed them on mobile, editing Capcut reels for Instagram, TikTok, and Snapchat drops.
Refreshed landing visuals and lookbooks in Figma and Canva, then pushed the updates live in WordPress to keep both brands distinct.
Set up WhatsApp broadcast journeys and Telegram VIP chats that doubled repeat purchase intent within 60 days.

items.title: ITP Venture Studio Rebrand
items.summary: I helped Aalto University's ITP program feel like a venture studio by pairing admissions storytelling with UI design.
outcomes: Ran 15 stakeholder interviews and translated them into journey maps in Notion before sketching the new flow in Figma.
Rebuilt the WordPress admissions microsite and refreshed the Notion prospectus so copy, visuals, and CTAs matched the new promise.
Packaged the design system with Adobe CC mockups and Miro walkthroughs so faculty can ship cohort collateral solo.

items.title: Aaltoes Ecosystem Platform
items.summary: I created a digital HQ that keeps Finland's biggest student entrepreneurship community moving.
outcomes: Audited 40+ legacy Notion hubs and MS Office decks, then rebuilt the navigation and UI components in Figma.
Designed partner, event, and alumni modules with Canva iconography before handing them off as WordPress-ready sections.
Documented publishing rituals in Notion and shared Google Sheets checklists so the next board can launch pages in under a day.

items.title: Aaltoes 2024 Marketing Rhythm
items.summary: I kept a 12-person student board in flow by running the marketing rhythm end-to-end.
outcomes: Mapped a 52-week marketing calendar inside Miro with color-coded lanes for events, sponsors, and content drops.
Hosted weekly stand-ups with agendas and recaps captured in Google Docs so volunteers always knew their plays.
Queued Instagram story recaps and Telegram updates straight from our Notion status log to share wins without extra meetings.

hero.title: Designing for Growth & Memory

sections.title: Design Philosophy
sections.description: Frameworks that keep experimentation grounded in empathy and craft.

tenets.title: Double Diamond: Discover to Define
tenets.detail: Open wide with research sprints, customer interviews, and competitive scans before tightening insights into a sharp problem statement.

tenets.title: Double Diamond: Develop to Deliver
tenets.detail: Prototype fast, test with real feedback, and ship the simplest version that proves value before scaling fidelity.

tenets.title: Apple Design Language: Clarity First
tenets.detail: Use hierarchy, generous white space, and purposeful motion so the audience always knows what matters most.

tenets.title: Apple Design Language: Craft Fuels Emotion
tenets.detail: Pair tactile visuals with crisp microcopy and sound design to evoke feeling while keeping the experience effortless.

tenets.title: Netflix Design: Personalization at Scale
tenets.detail: Prototype interfaces that flex in real time‚Äîcopy, visuals, and calls-to-action adapt based on what each viewer has watched, loved, or skipped.

tenets.title: Netflix Design: Playback Without Friction
tenets.detail: Treat loading states, performance budgets, and accessibility as part of the core story so content feels instant and inclusive on every device.

Scaled content engines that surface playbooks across partner ecosystems.
Set up measurement loops to track lift across pipeline, activation, and retention.

items.title: Slush Helsinki Volunteer Ops
items.summary: Activated peak-season operations for the world‚Äôs boldest founder festival, keeping momentum humming across stages, media, and partner zones.
outcomes: Coordinated crew pods supporting 300+ startup and investor sessions across the two-day summit.
Streamlined backstage rituals‚Äîspeaker prep, AV checks, and flow control‚Äîfor flagship stages in front of 10K+ attendees.
Captured qualitative feedback from founders and investors to inform next-year experience upgrades.

items.title: Junction Hackathon Volunteering
items.summary: Boosted one of Europe‚Äôs largest hackathons by orchestrating hacker hospitality, partner demos, and late-night energy rituals.
outcomes: Led check-in and ops touchpoints for 1,500+ builders, ensuring zero-bottleneck onboarding throughout opening night.
Partnered with sponsor squads to choreograph demo booth flow, maximizing mentor time and project exposure.
Crafted retention touches‚Äîwellness breaks, content snippets, and surprise activations‚Äîthat kept teams shipping through 48 hours.

outcomes: Distilled a full year of programming into an emotional three-minute narrative for stakeholders.
Combined event footage, interviews, and motion graphics to celebrate founders and partners.
Repurposed as a hero asset across sponsor updates, recruitment drives, and community socials.

experiences.description: Represented partner brands across food stores and caf√©s, blending in-person marketing with dependable customer care.

Build rapport with customers to surface promotions, collect qualitative feedback, and fuel repeat visits.

experiences.description: Welcomed visitors, supported cultural programming, and amplified museum storytelling across digital channels.

experiences.description: Led the family restaurant's expansion from Orivesi to Tampere, ensuring operations, teams, and guests stayed in sync.

story.title: My Story
story.description: From hospitality floors to growth labs‚Äîa journey blending marketing, design, and entrepreneurship.

hero.title: Hello, I'm Zunaira
hero.subtitle: Marketer, growth hacker, designer, and entrepreneur in the making‚Äîlearning by shipping.

sections.title: The Gold Between Every Move
sections.description: Scroll through the sideways chapters that turned heartbreak, migration, and hospitality shifts into my ability to see the golden lining in every turn of the adventure called life.

slides.title: Raised Between Dunes and Bazaars
slides.body: I was born in the United Arab Emirates, where shimmering skylines and expat energy shaped my first five years. When we moved to Pakistan for four more, bustling bazaars and family rituals taught me how to listen closely, read rooms fast, and find home wherever we landed.

image.alt: Kintsugi ceramic glowing with warm desert light

slides.title: A 12-Year-Old Starting Over
slides.body: At twelve, my brother and I followed our father to Finland after our parents divorced. A new culture, a new language, a small apartment‚Äîeveryday life turned into translation. I absorbed Finnish on buses, in classrooms, and through neighbors, determined not to let the distance between worlds define me.

resource.label: InfoFinland Support Portal
resource.description: Guides that helped immigrants like me decode daily life.

quote.text: Change hurt, but I let it stretch me‚Äînot shrink me.
quote.author: Zunaira

slides.title: Hospitality Became My Classroom
slides.body: By fourteen I was working part-time while keeping up with school. At sixteen I ran my father‚Äôs restaurant‚Äîordering supplies, balancing books, greeting guests, and keeping the team calm during rushes. Home meant tucking my brother in, managing homework, and making sure the fridge stayed full.

image.alt: Kintsugi ceramic repaired with golden seams

quote.text: Work, family, and school didn‚Äôt pull me apart‚Äîthey taught me how to orchestrate chaos with care.
quote.author: Zunaira

slides.title: Kintsugi as a Life Operating System
slides.body: Every fracture became a seam I could reinforce. I see my journey like the art of kintsugi‚Äîbroken pieces repaired with gold, more intricate and resilient than before. It‚Äôs how I design growth systems now: weaving empathy, grit, and strategy into stories that make people feel held.

quote.text: Every challenge poured more gold into the cracks, turning survival into craft.
quote.author: Zunaira Khan

resource.label: Kintsugi Origin Story
resource.description: Kintsugi ‚Äî the philosophy that inspires me.

sections.title: International Exposure
sections.description: Ten countries, countless perspectives‚Äîeach place taught me how to adapt, connect, and build across borders.

countries.name: United Arab Emirates
countries.description: Born here‚Äîwhere shimmering towers and expat hustle shaped my earliest memories.

countries.name: Pakistan
countries.description: Four formative years learning hospitality through family gatherings and bustling bazaars.

countries.name: Finland
countries.description: Home since twelve‚Äîwhere I learned resilience, ran a restaurant, and built my growth mindset.

countries.name: Sweden
countries.description: Cross-border trips that deepened my understanding of Nordic design and innovation culture.

countries.name: Denmark
countries.description: Hygge and human-centered design‚Äîlessons that inform how I craft customer experiences.

countries.name: Estonia
countries.description: A digital society ahead of its time‚Äîinspiring my approach to tech-enabled growth systems.

countries.name: Turkey
countries.description: Where East meets West‚Äîcultural bridges that mirror my own journey between worlds.

countries.name: Italy
countries.description: Artistry in every detail‚Äîfrom architecture to food‚Äîteaching me the power of craft and storytelling.

countries.name: Poland
countries.description: Resilience and reinvention‚Äîa country that rebuilt beautifully, much like kintsugi philosophy.

countries.name: Norway
countries.description: Fjords and fortitude‚Äîwhere nature's grandeur reminded me that growth happens in layers.
